content: calls for about 11 oz yarn total 7 oz white 3 5 oz lilac small amounts of yellow and green additional materials 2 pony beads for eyes fiberfill needle and thread this pattern is part of a multi-piece pattern listed under lace-up baby afghan and baby chick toy free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_afghans/lace-up_baby_afghan_and_baby_chick_toy/
